page.title: 03ATTITUDES, COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Some 25% completed and returned the 'house questionnaire'; 100% the 'farm questionnaire' and that during the busy time of the farmer's year! {COMMUNICATIONS} Eight postmen work at Chulmleigh Sorting Office, half full & the other part time - mornings only. Using 4 small Morris vans and 3 bicycles they deliver mail to the Chulmleigh postcode area, prefixed EX18, which covers some 160 sq km. {CLUBS} All the clubs that do exist have their volunteer officals run their organisations largely from their homes. The Cricket Club, in existence for over a hundred years, have a 'looked after' and fairly well drained pitch, and even boasts a small open pavilion next to a thatched loo. The Football Club fields two teams, arrange the site for their field and at present, also, use the secondary
